data.title: Websites
data.content:
Web development is more than just creating websites — it’s about designing interactive, user-friendly experiences that connect people and ideas worldwide. From responsive design to full-stack applications, modern developers use tools like React, Node.js, and MongoDB to bring digital visions to life.

Whether you’re coding your first landing page or deploying a complex web app, web development gives you the power to build, innovate, and shape the online world.
